div.p: REBATE or Rebatement, in commerce, a term much uſed at Amſterdam ſor an abatement in the price oſ ſevcral commodities, when the buyer, inſtead oſ ta-king time, advances ready money.
Rebatement, in heraldry, a diminution or abate-ment, of the bearings in a coat of arms. See Abatement.
